name: AffirmationHub
0:
”Alexa, open Affirmation Hub”
”Alexa, start Affirmation Hub”
”Alexa, launch Affirmation Hub”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: affirmation hub
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Affirmation Hub by Koachi is an Alexa skill designed to positively impact your life daily. Just listening to two affirmations per day can change your mood and reframe your current mindset. We recommend listening to two affirmations per day, once you have listened to your two affirmations hold them in mind through out your day.

WHY LISTEN TO AFFIRMATIONS?
An affirmation is a tool you can use to overcome many negative or destructive beliefs you have. Listening to positive affirmations daily can potentially improve your self-esteem, leave you feeling energised, impact your mood and reduce stress.

HOW DOES IT WORK?
To teach your Alexa this skill, simply say "Alexa, open Affirmation Hub". 

Once opened, you'll have the option of manifesting love or wealth in this given session. Once you tell Alexa what it is you would like to manifest you will hear affirmations related to your selection. You can continue to listen to more affirmations when prompted with "Would you like another affirmation?". 

To relaunch affirmation hub simply say "Alexa, open Affirmation Hub"

A NOTE FROM KOACHI
The purpose behind designing this skill is to positively impact individuals lives daily. Our hope is that the use of this skill will provide positive affirmations that resonate with our users and positively impact their day. If you have any feedback on how this skill has improved your day or how we can improve the skill to meet our users needs we would like to hear from you.

All the best,
Team Koachi
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
